ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grrr...  Died to Najena last night.  She chain-cast area effect spells that lagged everyone s video so much that we weren t able to do anything except
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 9 Aug 1999, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> Partied in Najena last night. Most of my party was bewildered
> as to why I didn't have my 'weapons' equiped during battle.
> I smiled and told them I did have my weapon equiped and held
> up my lute and battle drums.

Grrr... Died to Najena last night. She chain-cast area
effect spells that lagged everyone's video so much that we
weren't able to do anything except watch our hp drop. I
couldn't switch songs, cleric couldn't heal, etc. Turn off
particle density if you're going to attack her, though I don't
even know if that will help...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
